query.database_query: SELECT DISTINCT t.pref_name, cs.canonical_smiles, ac.standard_type, ac.standard_value, ac.standard_units, a.confidence_score FROM compound_structures cs, activities ac, assays a, target_dictionary t WHERE cs.molregno = ac.molregno AND ac.assay_id = a.assay_id AND a.assay_type = 'B' AND ac.standard_relation = '=' AND a.tid = t.tid AND t.target_type = 'SINGLE PROTEIN' AND ( (ac.standard_type = 'IC50' AND ac.standard_units = 'nM' ) OR (ac.standard_type = 'Ki' AND ac.standard_units = 'nM' ) OR (ac.standard_type = 'EC50' AND ac.standard_units = 'nM' ) OR (ac.standard_type = 'Log Ki' AND ac.standard_units IS NULL) OR (ac.standard_type = 'Kd' AND ac.standard_units = 'nM' ) OR (ac.standard_type = 'Log IC50' AND ac.standard_units IS NULL) ) AND t.organism = 'Homo sapiens' AND t.pref_name = 'HERG'  {};
